Hey Borja, 28 real employees were featured in the film but, there were also 28 actors including the lead character Gunnar. We are better at producing vodka than acting, and we needed some people needed to stay in on the production line.
Hey ChefOrc - 28 of our real employees were featured in the film but there were also 28 actors including our lead character Gunnar :)
Hey Joseph! This video is in compliance with all guidelines - but we still don't have anything to hide :)

Hey Marian! Absolut is passionate about diversity and inclusion with for example a 50/50 gender split in our Leadership team and a female CEO. In this video we wanted to give a transparent view of the people in Ã…hus who work at Absolut and so this film is representative of this community.

Hey Marian, Absolut is committed to diversity and equality around the world, for people of all races, ages and genders. We would love for you to take a look at our film 'Equal Love', released late last year. As mentioned, we wanted to give a transparent view of the people in Ã…hus who work at Absolut and so this film is representative of this community.
Hey Richard - we can definitely promise that!
Hey Tincuta, this is an age restricted YouTube video, based on community guidelines :)
Hey there - all of the 28 members of staff were more than happy to take part :)
Hey there, thanks for watching! We always knew we would censor to be compliant with regulations, as nudity here is just a metaphor for Absolutâ€™s transparency about our production process :)
Hi Carsten, we're sorry you didn't enjoy the film - the nudity here is just a metaphor for our transparency, but we had a great time making it :)

Hi David - we continue to work with Calum as part of the fantastic support he has done with previously- including a campaign over summer where he helped us in raising thousands of pounds for leading LGTB+ charity Stonewall in the UK.
Hi Martin, we're sorry that you didn't enjoy the ad - we're proud of our heritage and of our vodka, which is why 28 of our employees were happy to be featured in the film!
Hi there, glad you like it! At Absolut, we use a continuous distillation process, so it is impossible to measure exactly how many times the vodka in each bottle is distilled :)
Hilarious and brilliant. I may never look at a wonderful bottle of Absolut Vodka the same way again. But I will definitely purchase it!

You might want to do some research.  McSwiggan was featured on the Stonewall website for a number of years.   Following his conviction for violence and unfounded accusations of homophobia, he was removed from the site permanently.

If Stonewall are happy to be associated with him, you explain the above.

They are not the only charity to do this.  You will find all sorts of videos on his channel talking about his charitable work, but when you attempt to find them acknowledging his work, these organisations no longer want to be involved.

Absolut have long stood up for LGBT causes.  Perhaps you should review which allies they choose to stand alongside and when jumping to the defence of someone, at least present more than a snapshot of the truth.
